sentences.en: Advice to investors was based on the premise that interest rates would continue to fall.
sentences.cn: 给予投资者的建议是以利率将继续下降这一点为前提的.

sentences.en: Be brave to assert ourselves more on the premise of moral action.
sentences.cn: 在注重道德行为的前提下,勇敢地表现自己.

sentences.en: He acted on the premise that he was absolutely right.
sentences.cn: 他的行动是以"自己是绝对正确的"为前提的.

sentences.en: However, they forgot to mention a very basic premise in their reports.
sentences.cn: 但是, 他们的论述中遗忘了一些极基本的前提.

sentences.en: I disagree with the premise that economic development has priority over the environment.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成经济发展应优先于环境保护这个前提。

sentences.en: It is the premise and reference of improve and harness power quality.
sentences.cn: 这是治理和改善电能质量的必要前提和依据.

sentences.en: Let me premise my argument with a bit of history.
sentences.cn: 让我引述一些史实作为我立论的前提.

sentences.en: Schools may earn extra money by renting out their premises.
sentences.cn: 学校通过出租房屋场地可以获取额外收入。

sentences.en: Starting from this premise, the Meat Cutters opinion looked beyond the text of the statute itself.
sentences.cn: 从这一前提出发, “切肉机”案的观点好像超出了法规条文的范围.

sentences.en: the basic premise of her argument
The idea that there is life on other planets is the central premise of the novel.
sentences.cn: 其他星球存在生命这一观点是这部小说的核心前提。

sentences.en: The premise is that schools will work harder to improve if they must compete.
sentences.cn: 前提是，如果各学校必须参与竞争的话，就会更加努力。

sentences.en: Then we speak of a test of the problematic premise.
sentences.cn: 那么我们就涉及对有问题的前提的检验.

sentences.en: Want to seek rate steadily below the premise that assures quality.
sentences.cn: 要在保证质量的前提下稳步求速度.

sentences.en: We can deduce a conclusion from the premise.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从这个前提推出结论.

sentences.en: We must act on the premise that the worst can happen.
sentences.cn: 我们必须在可能发生最坏事态的前提下行动.

sentences.en: Well, now just a second, I don't altogether agree with the premise.
sentences.cn: 嗯，且慢，我并不完全同意这个前提。

words.tran_cn: 前提；上述各项；房屋连地基
引出，预先提出；作为…的前提

phrases.tran_cn: (尤指酒店)店外，屋外，建筑物外

trans.tran_cn: 前提，[复数]房屋，[复数][合同、契约用语]上述各点，（逻辑学中的）大[小]前提
trans.tran_en: the buildings and land that a shop, restaurant, company etc uses

trans.tran_cn: 引出，预先提出；作为…的前提
